name: CVG_ADDR_HX
description: This table extracts each coverage's historical addresses.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coverage record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_CITY
columns.description: This item is used to store the city listed in a coverage's historical address.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to store the state listed in a coverage's historical address.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_ZIP
columns.description: This item is used to store the ZIP code listed in a coverage's historical address.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_COUNTY_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to store the county listed in a coverage's historical address.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_COUNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to store the country listed in a coverage's historical address.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_HOUSE_NUM
columns.description: This item is used to store the house number listed in a coverage's historical address.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_DISTRICT_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to store the district listed in a coverage's historical address.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_CONTACT
columns.description: This item is used to store the name of the contact person associated with a coverage's historical address.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_START_DT
columns.description: This item is used to store the date on which a coverage's historical address became effective.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_END_DT
columns.description: This item is used to store the date on which a coverage's historical address is no longer effective.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_PDS_IDNT
columns.description: This item is used to store the unique identifier assigned to a coverage's historical address by the Personal Demographics Service.

columns.name: ADDR_HX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to store the address type of a coverage's historical address.
